channel.title: Problem with pk point pking
channel.description:
I have a problem I've been trying to make the code for when you kill someone, you receive an amount of pk points.
I've massively failed whilst doing it... I've been searching all over mopar for a tut/pi and I can't seem to find one...
Could any of you help me?
Sorry for the hassal...
